name: edu_more
text: The educator leads classroom activities, and the AI system supports those activities

name: edu_med
text: Sometimes the educator leads classroom activities and AI supports, and sometimes AI leads the classroom activities and the educator supports

name: edu_less
text: The AI leads classroom activities and the teacher supports those activities

name: eval_more
text: Every AI system that is introduced to the classroom should be evaluated beforehand for student learning outcomes

name: eval_med
text: AI systems should be evaluated for student learning outcomes only if a community member requests one

name: eval_less
text: AI systems do not have to be evaluated for student learning outcomes

name: ailit_more
text: All students have at least 10 hours of AI literacy each year

name: ailit_med
text: Students can take AI literacy through an elective

name: ailit_less
text: There is no requirement for AI literacy

name: bias_more
text: A third-party audit needs to be done to make sure that the data that the AI system uses is representative of the students that will be using it

name: bias_med
text: A third-party audit needs to be done only if the AI system is suspected to be biased

name: bias_less
text: The dataset need not be audited by a third party

name: privacy_less
text: There are no limits to what the AI system can collect

name: privacy_med
text: School districts should decide on what data is collected, and parents have to approve

name: privacy_more
text: The AI system does not collect or save data

name: integ_less
text: It is OK for students to use AI to complete any assignment

name: integ_med
text: It is OK for students to use AI to complete an assignment if the teacher has given permission

name: integ_more
text: It is never OK for students to use AI to complete an assignment

name: techno_less
text: There are no limits to what the AI system can help the district with or how

name: techno_med
text: There should be guidelines for what and how the AI system should be helping the district with

name: techno_more
text: There should be restrictions on what the AI system should be assisting the district with

name: funding_less
text: All districts should get an equal amount of funding for AI tools

name: funding_med
text: Districts should have to apply for funding if they are interested in AI tools

name: funding_more
text: Title I schools are given priority for funding for AI tools
